Articles.Content:
I Was playing and building my station using the Apollo style transposition docking and extraction method to get my modules an I had docked to the station and wanted to move my csm,s to the back and I tried to undock from the module I carried to the station and couldn't because this happened to me in version 1.1.3 and both docking ports say they are undocked but the csm aint moving. So does anyone have any suggestions for hoe to separate the two ships.

Edited September 28, 2016 by Buzz light fear
